JLex
Class SparseBitSet

java.lang.Object
  JLex.SparseBitSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
final class SparseBitSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable

A set of bits. The set automatically grows as more bits are needed.

Version:
1.00, 25 Jul 1999
Author:
C. Scott Ananian
